name: Friendbuy
tag_list: socialmarketing, web2-0, refer-a-friend, widget, sharing, social
overview:
Friendbuy was founded by a team of curious marketers and technologists determined to make sharing an important, powerful marketing channel. We love how sharing leads people to discover new products, new communities and new ideas. The Friendbuy platform is an expression of our inquisitive, slightly analytic disposition.

We think sharing should be easy. For the marketer, sharing campaigns should be easy to set up, test and manage. We draw our inspiration from products that are fun and easy-to-use. For the consumers, sharing should work better – a simple, elegant experience.

Friendbuy powers sharing and referrals for every kind of site – publishers, e-commerce, mom & pop retailers, software-as-a-service, non-profit, and even filmmakers. Friendbuy powers every kind of sharing campaign – referral incentives, promotion sharing, post-purchase sharing, brand sharing, share a video, an article, or a blog. Whatever your site, Friendbuy supercharges sharing to deliver new visitors and new customers. We also show you incredible social data that you simply can’t get anywhere else.
